Computational Methods in Economics Working Group (Econ 61600)

Together with Thibaut Lamadon and Guillaume Pouliot, I co-organize the UChicago economic department’s computational methods in economics working group (Econ 61600).

We meet on a bi-weekly basis. Please reach out if you’re interested in participating!
